Moja ulubiona gra, wręcz się w niej zakochałem. Half-Life to gra, która pozwala wcielić się nam w naukowca, co prawda wiele z tych naukowców na wpływ graczy ma upośledzony głos, dziwnie zbudowaną twarz, ale to tylko dodaje zabawy. Gra utrzymuje klimat, posiada wiele broni, ma świetną grafikę, oraz co najważniejsze według mojej opinii, ma najlepszy system walki.Grę serdecznie polecam mówiąc/pisząc "Bhop!"

[b]Half-Life[/b] is really special. This game alone changed the entire gaming industry for the better.
With the [b]GoldSrc[/b] engine, many other franchises were born, for example [b]"Team Fortress"[/b] , [b]"Counter Strike"[/b] and [b]"Day of Defeat"[/b].

[b]I've played this game through multiple times[/b] [i](I didn't have the game on my account before)[/i] [b]and it still ceases to amaze me[/b]

[i]"Gordon Freeman in the flesh. Or rather, in the hazard suit."[/i] - Gman

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]
- Story is awesome and memorable
- Movement is quite good
- Weapons in this game is really good to handle even to this day
- Soundtrack is top notch
- Voice acting is quite good
- Well designed enemies
- Some great puzzles
- Very well made map design
- Multiplayer mode which is chaotic, I love it
- Lots of mods are made for this game

[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b]
- The flashlight acts like a spotllight
- Very few bugs
- Outdated graphics [i](Obviously since the game is from 1998)[/i]

[b][u]Mod Reviews:[/u][/b]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TheBeggarSoldier/recommended/354900/]Headcrab Frenzy![/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TheBeggarSoldier/recommended/261980/]Half-Life: Before[/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TheBeggarSoldier/recommended/679990/]Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D.[/url]

[b]10/10[/b] Gameplay and story wise, this game still holds up amazingly and you shouldn't wait, just get it already and play this masterpiece!

good

Nostalgia is fun - this game is endearing in its simplicity and old-school game play. There's a reason it was game-of-the-year in 1998. Remember when jumping and crouching were new in FPS games? So much retro fun! Of course the graphics are cheesy, but that just lets you enjoy the play.

Un videojuego lleno de acción, monstruos, trampas y mucha sangre, además de explosiones y muertes instantáneas. Aliens asesinos, un tío misterioso con corbata que nos vigila y aparece de vez en cuando, soldados corruptos, este juego lo tiene todo, al menos lo tenía cuando era pequeño y lo jugaba. Ahora con la modernidad y gráficos actuales este juego queda muy anticuado y cutre pero se disfruta mucho la historia. Se disfruta mucho por la variedad de armas, trampas que superar, campo de minas y los enemigos no nos lo pone nada fácil, lo bueno es que guardamos y cargamos juego cuando queramos, pero cuidado, si cometéis un error será vuestra perdición. Aconsejo guardar partida continuamente en varios bloques.

Ugh the graphics have obviously not aged well but that is to be expected. The sound and voices also have obviously not aged well. I love the jiggle physics for the female black ops breasts haha. The enemy US marine soldiers had amazing AI for their time they can charge your position, throw grenades, yell orders to eachother, and try to flank you. Problem is they're all bullet sponges and the shooting in this game has dated as bad as it's sequel. Also the Marines are using MP5's with grenade launchers when realistically they would all be using M4's and M16's with grenade launchers! Valve knows nothing about guns! All in all this game and it's expansions have aged poorly over the past decades. I 100% recommend the remake Black Mesa! I'd still very much prefer and recommend Black Mesa over this and the sequel as Black Mesa seems to have the best gunplay and polish in the entire franchise and that remake was made by devs not by Valve!!! The only thing I like from this game is that the female black ops have bouncing jiggling boob physics lol. Last thing is holy fuck is the opening train car sequence way to fuckin long like holy shit it's way to long which is fine for a first time playthrough but you can't fuckin skip it on multiple playthroughs! The Xen setting looks like complete dogshit and you're better off playing the remake Black Mesa instead!

Playing this game in 2020 can be a mixed bag. It has dated aspects in the gameplay that can be frustating along with a few chapters that over stay their welcome. Despite these flaws, I still enjoyed the game. The gameplay is still rock solid and can provide a good challenge. Just know that you will have to deal with some jank but enjoy this piece of gaming history.
